name: FSplineSupportPair
comment: Copyright 2016-2019 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

properties.name: SplineSupportRecipeClass
properties.comment: What recipe to use for the spline support

properties.name: SplineRecipeClass
properties.comment: What recipe to use for the spline

methods.name: OnPrimaryFirePressed
methods.comment: Initiate a build on aimed location

methods.name: SetupSplineAndSupport
methods.comment: Sets up spline and support actor so that a spline can be built from location

methods.name: ClearSplineAndSupport
methods.comment: Clears spline and support hologram so we can move freely instead

methods.name: OnSecondaryFirePressed
methods.comment: Initiate a move to aimed location

methods.name: Server_PrimaryFire
methods.comment: Lets the server handle the action.

methods.name: Server_SecondaryFire
methods.comment: Lets the server handle the action.

methods.name: Server_UpdateHitResult
methods.comment: Lets the server handle the action.

methods.name: GetTrail
methods.comment: Returns the trail actor associated with this pipe builder

methods.name: SetHologramsActive
methods.comment: Sets if holograms should be active

methods.name: IsReadyToBuild
methods.comment: Do we have all holograms set up and ready to build?

methods.name: SpawnHolograms
methods.comment: Removes old holograms and spawns new ones

methods.name: TickMove
methods.comment: Handles movement of the pipe builder

properties.name: mMovementComponent
properties.comment: The main skeletal mesh associated with this Vehicle

properties.name: mPipeSupportLocation
properties.comment: Component used to determine generators location

properties.name: mSplineHologram
properties.comment: The hologram to build.

properties.name: mSupportHologram
properties.comment: Hologra of pipe support that indicates where to build the pipe to

properties.name: mCurrentSplineSupportRecipeClass
properties.comment: What recipe to use for the pipe support

properties.name: mCurrentSplineRecipeClass
properties.comment: What recipe to use for the spline

properties.name: mInternalSplineSupport
properties.comment: The pipe support that the pipe is built from

properties.name: mHitResult
properties.comment: Result of the latest trace.

properties.name: mDoMovement
properties.comment: Do we want to perform movement

properties.name: mStartLocation
properties.comment: Start point for movement of the pipe builder

properties.name: mEndLocation
properties.comment: End point for movement of the pipe builder

properties.name: mLocationAlpha
properties.comment: Alpha value used when interpolating between start and end point for movement

properties.name: mMoveTime
properties.comment: How long time the movement should take in seconds

properties.name: mHeightCurve
properties.comment: Curve used for height offset when moving

properties.name: mTrailClass
properties.comment: Class of what trail to use

properties.name: mTrail
properties.comment: Cached reference to the trail actor

properties.name: mSplineAndSupportData
properties.comment: Array with what spline based recipes can be built and their corresponding supports

properties.name: mRecipeIndex
properties.comment: Current index indicating what recipe is selected

properties.name: mIsSplineAndSupportSetup
properties.comment: Are spline and support holograms set up correctly

properties.name: mTrailDistance
properties.comment: What distance to keep between trail and pipe builder
